meanings.sent1: The puzzle was finished and all the pieces were in place.
meanings.sent2: The race was finished, and the winner crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The movie was finished, but the popcorn was not!
meanings.sent4: The project was finished, leaving a sense of accomplishment in the air.
meanings.sent5: The book was finished, closing the chapter on a thrilling adventure.

meanings.definition: No longer able to continue; done.
meanings.sent1: The meal was finished, and there was nothing left on the plate.
meanings.sent2: The game was finished, and the players packed up their equipment.
meanings.sent3: The battery was finished, so the toy stopped working.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runner was finished, completely exhausted at the end of the race.
meanings.sent5: The conversation was finished, leaving an awkward silence in the room.

meanings.definition: Having a surface that has been treated in some way.
meanings.sent1: The finished wood gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The finished metal had a smooth and shiny appearance.
meanings.sent3: The finished cake was decorated with colorful frosting.
meanings.sent4: The finished floor sparkled after being polished.
meanings.sent5: The finished painting hung proudly on the wall, showcasing the artist's talent.
